description: This is a simple version. Quick and easy for everyday meal.
keywords: Pork dishes,Eggplant,High protein,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free
name: Spicy Eggplants with Minced Pork Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 tbs lee kum kee chilli bean sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Clean and slice eggplant into thin portions. Soak in mild salt water (enough to cover) for 15-20 minutes. Pat dry with paper towel and set aside.
Marinate minced pork with salt, sugar and soy sauce. Wait for 5-10 minutes.
Heat pan and add 1 tbsp oil. Stir fry minced pork with medium heat until cooked. Place onto a plate and set aside.
Add another tbsp oil into pan at medium heat. Add eggplant, keep stirring until softened.
Put the minced pork back into the pan and stir through with eggplant.
Add chilli bean sauce and stir through. Serve.
